about.description:
Lime Suite is a collection of software supporting several hardware
platforms including the LimeSDR, drivers for the LMS7002M transceiver
RFIC, and other tools for developing with LMS7-based hardware.
Installing the Lime Suite enables many SDR applications such as GQRX
to work with supported hardware through the bundled SoapySDR support
module.

The `liblimesuite` package contains the main library that other
packages should develop against. The `soapysdr-module-lms7` package
contains the Soapy SDR module that supports Lime devices. The
`limesuite` package provides the entire software suite, depending
on the previous packages and also providing GUI tools.
about.summary: Driver and GUI for LMS7002M-based (Lime) SDR platforms

name: limesuite
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: limesuite
  version: 20.10.0
source:
  patches:
    - 0001-Modify-build-system-to-use-system-glew-instead-of-th.patch
    - 0002-ConnectionFX3-Allow-choice-between-libusb-and-CyAPI-.patch
  sha256: f6d79dc67cb52a5aea839d1dc00e65f85367cb2c275d77f149833d32cf79b467
  url: https://github.com/myriadrf/LimeSuite/archive/v20.10.0.tar.gz
build:
  noarch: false
  noarch_python: false
  number: '1'
  script: install.sh
  string: h75efa04_1
requirements:
  build:
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h0d85af4_4
    - c-ares 1.17.1 h0d85af4_1
    - ca-certificates 2020.12.5 h033912b_0
    - cctools_osx-64 949.0.1 h6407bdd_21
    - cctools_osx-arm64 949.0.1 h55de48a_21
    - clang 11.1.0 h694c41f_1
    - clang-11 11.1.0 default_he082bbe_1
    - clang_osx-arm64 11.1.0 h40be2b1_2
    - clangxx 11.1.0 default_he082bbe_1
    - clangxx_osx-arm64 11.1.0 hc50fe25_2
    - cmake 3.20.2 h32a7a09_0
    - compiler-rt 11.1.0 h654b07c_0
    - compiler-rt_osx-64 11.1.0 h8c5fa43_0
    - expat 2.3.0 he49afe7_0
    - krb5 1.17.2 h60d9502_0
    - ld64_osx-64 530 he8994da_21
    - ld64_osx-arm64 530 h3681fde_21
    - ldid 2.1.2 h7660a38_2
    - libclang-cpp11.1 11.1.0 default_he082bbe_1
    - libcurl 7.76.1 h8ef9fac_1
    - libcxx 11.1.0 habf9029_0
    - libedit 3.1.20191231 h0678c8f_2
    - libev 4.33 haf1e3a3_1
    - libllvm11 11.1.0 hd011deb_2
    - libnghttp2 1.43.0 h07e645a_0
    - libssh2 1.9.0 h52ee1ee_6
    - libuv 1.41.0 hbcf498f_0
    - llvm-tools 11.1.0 hd011deb_2
    - lz4-c 1.9.3 h046ec9c_0
    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - ninja 1.10.2 h9a9d8cb_0
    - openssl 1.1.1k h0d85af4_0
    - rhash 1.4.1 h35c211d_0
    - tapi 1100.0.11 h9ce4665_0
    - tk 8.6.10 h0419947_1
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1010
    - zstd 1.4.9 h582d3a0_0
  host:
    - glew 2.1.0 h9f76cd9_2
    - libcxx 11.1.0 h168391b_0
    - liblimesuite 20.10.0 hbdafb3b_1
    - soapysdr-module-lms7 20.10.0 h1576d20_1
  run:
    - glew >=2.1.0,<2.2.0a0
    - libcxx >=11.1.0
    - liblimesuite 20.10.0 hbdafb3b_1
    - soapysdr-module-lms7 20.10.0 h1576d20_1
test:
  commands:
    - LimeUtil --info
    - SoapySDRUtil --info
about:
  description: 'Lime Suite is a collection of software supporting several hardware

    platforms including the LimeSDR, drivers for the LMS7002M transceiver

    RFIC, and other tools for developing with LMS7-based hardware.

    Installing the Lime Suite enables many SDR applications such as GQRX

    to work with supported hardware through the bundled SoapySDR support

    module.


    The `liblimesuite` package contains the main library that other

    packages should develop against. The `soapysdr-module-lms7` package

    contains the Soapy SDR module that supports Lime devices. The

    `limesuite` package provides the entire software suite, depending

    on the previous packages and also providing GUI tools.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/myriadrf/LimeSuite
  doc_url: https://wiki.myriadrf.org/Lime_Suite
  home: http://wiki.myriadrf.org/Lime_Suite
  license: Apache-2.0 AND MIT AND BSD-3-Clause
  license_file:
    - COPYING
    - external/cpp-feather-ini-parser/LICENSE
    - external/kissFFT/COPYING
  summary: Driver and GUI for LMS7002M-based (Lime) SDR platforms
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: limesuite
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ryanvolz
